front.title: Bulk Re-registration for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: The Proxy Mobile IPv6 specification requires the Mobile Access Gateway (MAG) to send a separate Proxy Binding Update (PBU) message to the Local Mobility Agent (LMA) for each mobile node (MN), to renew the MN's mobility binding, when the MNs binding lifetime is close to expiry. This document defines a mechanism by which a MAG can update the mobility bindings of multiple MNs attached to it with a single PBU message to the serving LMA.
